publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3584# Margaret Smith: Edinburgh Park Railway Station-That the Parliament notes the recent announcement that construction of the Edinburgh Park Railway Station can begin; welcomes the funding supplied by the Strategic Rail Authority, City of Edinburgh Council and New Edinburgh Ltd; further welcomes the investment in new rolling stock from the Scottish Executive; is concerned that agreement on the project was delayed by performance targets; considers that the Scottish Executive should examine how this station can serve the Edinburgh to Glasgow rail line, and asks the Executive to ensure that construction of the station and the provision of additional rolling stock is completed as soon as possible.

S1M-3584# Margaret Smith: Edinburgh Park Railway Station-That the Parliament notes the recent announcement that construction of the Edinburgh Park Railway Station can begin; welcomes the funding supplied by the Strategic Rail Authority, City of Edinburgh Council and New Edinburgh Ltd; further welcomes the investment in new rolling stock from the Scottish Executive; is concerned that agreement on the project was delayed by performance targets; considers that the Scottish Executive should examine how this station can serve the Edinburgh to Glasgow rail line, and considers that the Executive should ensure that construction of the station and the provision of additional rolling stock is completed as soon as possible.
S1M-3584# Edinburgh Park Railway Station (lodged on 14 November 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-3584# Edinburgh Park Railway Station (lodged on 14 November 2002) Robert Brown*
S1M-3584# Edinburgh Park Railway Station (lodged on 14 November 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
